00025 #include "throws_exception_test.hpp"
00026 #include <aeryn/test_funcs.hpp>
00027 #include <stdexcept>
00028 
00029 namespace Aeryn
00030 {
00031         namespace
00032         {
00034                 template< typename T >
00035                 class Thrower
00036                 {
00037                 public:
00039                         Thrower()
00040                         {
00041                                 throw T();
00042                         }
00043                 };
00044 
00046                 class NonThrower
00047                 {
00048                 };
00049 
00051                 const char* const filename = __FILE__;
00052         }               
00053         
00055         void ThrowsExceptionTest
00056                 ()
00057         {
00058                 THROWS_EXCEPTION( Thrower< std::exception >(), std::exception );
00059         }
00060 
00062         void ThrowsExceptionFailTest
00063                 ()
00064         {
00065                 unsigned long line = 0;
00066 
00067                 try
00068                 {
00069                         line = __LINE__; THROWS_EXCEPTION( NonThrower(), std::exception );
00070                         FAILED( "THROWS_EXCEPTION( \"\";, std::exception ) failed" );
00071                 }
00072                 catch( const TestFailure& e )
00073                 {
00074                         IS_EQUAL( "Failed to throw std::exception", e.Failure() );
00075                         IS_EQUAL( line, e.Line() );
00076                         IS_EQUAL( filename, e.File() );
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00081         void ThrowsExceptionWrongExceptionTest
00082                 ()
00083         {
00084                 unsigned long line = 0;
00085 
00086                 try
00087                 {
00088                         line = __LINE__; THROWS_EXCEPTION( Thrower< std::exception >(), std::bad_alloc );
00089                         FAILED( "THROWS_EXCEPTION( Thrower< std::exception >(), std::bad_alloc ) failed" );
00090                 }
00091                 catch( const TestFailure& e )
00092                 {
00093                         IS_EQUAL( "Threw wrong exception: not std::bad_alloc", e.Failure() );
00094                         IS_EQUAL( line, e.Line() );
00095                         IS_EQUAL( filename, e.File() );
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00100         void DoesNotThrowExceptionTest
00101                 ()
00102         {
00103                 DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( NonThrower() );
00104         }
00105 
00107         void DoesNotThrowExceptionFailTest
00108                 ()
00109         {
00110                 unsigned long line = 0;
00111 
00112                 try
00113                 {
00114                         line = __LINE__; DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( Thrower< std::exception >() );
00115                         FAILED( "DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( throw std::bad_alloc(); ) failed" );
00116                 }
00117                 catch( const TestFailure& e )
00118                 {
00119                         IS_EQUAL( "Exception Thrown", e.Failure() );
00120                         IS_EQUAL( line, e.Line() );
00121                         IS_EQUAL( filename, e.File() );
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00126 }
